title: Dunivant: Sacramento Clearly a MLS City
itunes:title: Dunivant: Sacramento Clearly a MLS City
description:
Sacramento Republic FC is on its way to becoming an expansion Major League Soccer team. Jason, Barr, and Lynch speak with the President and General Manager of Sacramento Republic FC, Todd Dunivant, about the hurdles to achieving that goal, the business opportunities behind professional sports in the city, the logistics of building a new stadium and finding investors, and what's next for Major League Soccer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
